title: # 442 - Sam Morril & ME
description:
Today I sit down with comedian Sam Morril. We talk about what it was like shooting his new special on different rooftops in New York, ambush shows, dating during covid, and much more!

 

Sam’s new special “Sam Morril: Up on the Roof” is available on YouTube here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M0qDTYmaT-Y 

 

This episode is brought to you by Buffalo Trace Whiskey. Go to http://www.Buffalotrace.com to order yours today.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Kamikoto. Get an extra $50 off site wide at http://www.kamikoto.com when you use the code “BERT” 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Hims. Go to http://www.forhims.com/bertcast for your free visit.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Whoop. Go to http://www.Whoop.com and use the Code “Bertcast” at checkout to get your first month free. 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Manscaped. Get 20% Off and Free Shipping with the code BERT at http://www.Manscaped.com  

 

This episode is also brought to you by SkyLight Frames. Get $10 off your purchase of a Skylight Frame when you go http://www.SkylightFrame.com and enter code “BERT” 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
